script.name: CLI_DEVICE_DETECT_EXP
script.description: Script to detect the prompt on a device connected to a SLC or SLB device port, and set the device port name to the prompt.

script.name: CLI_AUTH_RADIUS_EXP
script.description: Script to set the RADIUS authentication settings of the SLC

script.name: CLI_AUTH_RADIUS_PY
script.description: Script to set the RADIUS authentication settings of the SLC

script.name: GET_DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_EXP
script.description: Script to get the current internal temperature of the console manager

script.name: GET_LOAD_DEVICE_PORT_EXP
script.description: This script interacts with an SLB managed device to get the load of PDU outlet. In this case, the managed device connected to the SLB managed device is a ServerTech PDU

script.name: SAVE_COPY_OF_CISCO_CONFIG_EXP
script.description: This script saves a copy of the running configuration of a Cisco server to a TFTP server. The Cisco server is connected to an SLC or SLB device port

script.name: SET_DEVICE_PORT_NAME_EXP
script.description: Script to set the name on all SLC/B device ports

script.name: GET_DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_PY
script.description: This script interacts with the CLI on the SLC 8000 or SLB console manager to get the current internal temperature of the device

script.name: GET_DEVICE_TEMPERATURE_TCL
script.description: This script interacts with the CLI on the SLC 8000 or SLB console manager to get the current internal temperature of the device

script.name: SET_DNS_SERVERS_SLC_EXP
script.description: This script sets the DNS servers of the SLC
